name: Escape the Keyboard
description:
A text adventure, complete with text! However, your keyboard has seen better days. Time to break out some more modern hardware!

Currently comes with a limited set of levels that kinda scale in difficulty. With enough interest I will flesh out this game for a full version!

Made using the Godot 3 game engine.

Music is La Calahorra by Rolemusic. [license]

Level Hints (minor spoilers below!):

  1. This is a tutorial level. Try a bit harder. In case you didn't figure it out already, you click on words to type them in, then press ENTER.
  2. Pay close attention to the hints! They may not seem helpful at face value...
  3. Where'd the help button go? Terrible wordplay and lateral thinking to follow.
